recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Classic spaghetti with a rich, meaty tomato sauce
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the spaghetti and cook until al dente, about 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the ground beef and cook until browned, about 10 minutes.
Add the canned tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Season with salt and black pepper.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the skillet with the sauce. Toss to combine and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Roasted Chicken
recipes.description: Juicy and flavorful roasted chicken with crispy skin
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.
Remove the giblets from the chicken and pat dry with paper towels.
Cut the lemon in half and stuff it inside the chicken, along with the garlic.
Rub the chicken with olive oil and season generously with salt and black pepper.
Place the chicken in a roasting pan and roast for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165 degrees F.
Let the chicken rest for 10-15 minutes before carving and serving.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: A classic Indian dish with tender chicken in a creamy tomato sauce
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, cumin, paprika, garam masala, cayenne pepper, and salt. Add the chicken and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or up to overnight.
Preheat the broiler to high. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.
Remove the chicken from the marinade and place on the prepared baking sheet. Broil for 10-12 minutes, or until browned and cooked through.
Meanwhile, melt the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the tomato sauce and bring to a simmer. Season with salt and black pepper.
Stir in the heavy cream and cooked chicken. Simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the chicken is fully cooked. Serve with rice or naan bread.
